attributes.description:
This near new home is perfectly positioned to soak up the sun and the Papamoa lifestyle! With the furniture included all you need to do is pack your bags and arrive, your coastal escape is ready and waiting:

  • Cleverly designed layout with open plan kitchen, with a walk in pantry, along with dining and family zones - ideal for everyday living, interacting and entertaining with your family and friends
  • Separate lounge for chilling, movie nights or rugby time
  • Plenty of room to accommodate a family with three spacious double bedrooms and two stylish bathrooms, including a master suite that flows outdoors
  • Great indoor/outdoor flow for summer BBQs, backyard lounging or morning coffees in the sun
  • Partially fenced to keep pets and little ones safe
  • Lock and leave ease or a dreamy BookaBach setup
  • The location is central, just 6.4 kms to the local Papamoa Shops and close to Te Manawa O Papamoa School

Fun, fresh, and fabulously easy - your next chapter starts here!

attributes.description:
Auction: Tauranga Bowling Club,The Domain, 37 Cameron Road on Wednesday 18 June 2025 at 1:00PM (unless sold prior)

This traditional brick and tile three-bed, two-bath home is all about relaxed beach town living. Nestled in a very established friendly neighborhood, it’s just a short walk to Papamoa town centre with the library, shops, doctors and bus connections, everything you need right at your doorstep. Inside, you’ll find a comfy layout with an internal garage and plenty of natural light.

The kitchen and dining enjoy the morning sun while you’ll keep cosy in colder months with two heat pumps and an HRV system throughout the house. The windows are double glazed to keep the heat in and there are LED lights throughout the house for extra efficiency.

There's also A LOT of storage throughout the house so you'll never be short of a cupboard. But the real gem? The backyard – a hidden little haven with veggie gardens, established trees with an irrigation bore pump that ensures plenty of well fed gardens. The generous backyard gives an opportunity to extend the house in the future if needed or just enjoy a sense of space for families. Bonus double wide side gate for backyard access for your boat or camper parking. This shouts out to families or empty nesters that want to enjoy a very easy and low maintenance lifestyle. While being smack bang in the fantastic offerings that Papamoa township and beach offer. If you're chasing that laid-back coastal vibe, this place is packed with potential ready to go.

attributes.description:
Welcome to one of the largest homes in exclusive Dunes Village, Papamoa - where lifestyle, location, and luxury come together. Nestled on a sought-after corner site, this stunning property offers 244 square metres of land - providing space, privacy, and parking galore. Whether it's that extra car, your boat, or a motor home - there's room for it all. Step outside and discover not one, but two beautifully landscaped outdoor living areas, both sheltered by elegant pergolas. Follow the sun throughout the day and enjoy your choice of relaxing retreats. Inside, you'll find a well-designed floor plan that flows effortlessly. The modern kitchen is a home chef's dream - stylish, functional, and perfect for preparing meals with ease. Dunes Village is a secure and serene over-55s community, known for its peaceful atmosphere and friendly, like-minded neighbours. Located in the heart of Papamoa, you're just moments from the Sands Town Centre - with New World and your favourite cafés and eateries just down the road. And with the upcoming Tauranga expressway link, easy access to Tauranga and Mt Maunganui is right around the corner. This is truly a premium opportunity - homes like this in Dunes Village don't come up often. Don't delay - call today to arrange a private viewing, or pop along to the next open home. This is the lifestyle you've been waiting for.

Please contact the Harcourts Sales Consultant to arrange a viewing

To request documents please visit Harcourts: https://harcourts.net/L34525230

address.full-address: 34 Arrow Close (Dunes Lifestyle Village), Papamoa, Tauranga, Bay of Plenty

attributes.description:
Immaculately presented and lovingly maintained, this family haven is wrapped in a blanket of community comfort.
From its generous, corner site perch, the abode boasts delightful street appeal, welcoming you to step inside to a calm and tranquil interior. Lush carpets in creamy tones add cosy warmth, contrasting a backdrop of cool white walls and dusky blue soft furnishings.
A long hallway guides from the entry, passing abundant storage solutions and all three light filled bedrooms, including the master with a sizeable ensuite and walk in wardrobe. Sensibly sitting away from life's daily bustle, they easily accommodate growing broods.
Central living is an open plan configuration, creating a spacious and harmonious communal hub. The kitchen is in impeccable condition, offering a modern and functional workspace. Domestic chefs will appreciate the interaction with family members thanks to a breakfast bar, and seamless link to both dining and lounging.
Enjoy instantaneous connection to a north facing deck for sun drenched brunches, lunches, and all day basking. Tall hedging provides sublime seclusion around the cobbled courtyard opposite, inviting you to pull up a chair and watch as the sky dazzles over Papamoa's horizon.
It's evident that lifestyle was a top consideration during the landscaping design phase, and easy care plantings are superbly positioned to frame the home, yet promise minimal upkeep, including Japanese Maple, Flax, Citrus and Magnolia. You'll also find a raised herb and vegetable patch, thriving and ready for harvest.
Nestled amid similar properties within a likeminded neighbourhood in one of Papamoa's newer developments, this location sits just a short distance to local amenities, schooling, bus and arterial routes.
Look no further for a double dose of newness and tip top comfort!

address.full-address: 56 Te Kio Crescent, Papamoa, Tauranga, Bay of Plenty

attributes.header: Opportunity Abounds in Blue Chip Location
attributes.description:
Please disregard this property's CV. The property will potentially sell below this level.

This property makes you feel like you've stepped into a world of possibility and nostalgia, were holiday homes brim with quaint coastal character and nod to yesteryear.
Whether you're a first-time buyer, savvy investor, keen DIYer, or simply seeking a seasonal family escape - or a site with potential to remove and rebuild the existing dwelling and create your dream coastal home - this opportunity answers all calls.
Capturing the essence of laid-back living in one of Papamoa's most popular streets, the intriguing configuration weaves its way across three split levels. The home's entrance sits mid-tier, inviting you into spacious, open plan living where high-pitched ceilings and generous windows create an airy, sunlit haven. Still, it's the bay over the kitchen countertop that turns on the charm, providing an all-encompassing vantage of the peaceful neighbourhood.
Two bedrooms reside on the upper level, and both maintain the beach bach vibes through unique design, but it's the proportionate decking adjoining one that everyone will fight for.
An additional bedroom and second living room exist downstairs, offering versatile alternatives, including guest accommodation, an at-home office solution, a gym, or a rumpus room.
Slider access connects seamlessly from here to an enclosed outdoor nook. This securely fenced private pocket boasts built-in seating, meaning it's ready and waiting; roll in the barbie, fire it up, and you're good to go.
Drenched in natural light, sunshine warms every inch of this abode from top to toe, and it's easy to conceive a fantastically envy-worthy future here.
And for those with grander ambitions, the potential to rebuild or start fresh is a compelling bonus - this is a prime canvas for your dream coastal home. Whether you choose to renovate, reimagine, or completely redevelop, the scope here is as exciting as it is rare.
This tip-top location removes you from the daily rush and holiday season throng, yet remains conveniently connected to handy amenities, schooling, bus routes and more.

attributes.header: Unique Opportunity - Coastal Living Comes to Life
attributes.description:
Step into Apartment 1 and let the calm of the ocean wash over you. This expansive, open-plan residence blends comfort and coastal style, overlooking the golden Papamoa dunes and the ocean beyond. Perfectly positioned on the sought-after Papamoa beachfront promenade, it's mere metres from the shoreline - where ocean breezes soothe and morning beach walks are part of everyday life.

Thoughtfully designed for effortless living, the spacious interior flows seamlessly onto a generous deck - the perfect spot to unwind, entertain, or simply soak in the coastal serenity.

The layout is cleverly configured, offering two generous bedrooms, two modern bathrooms, and a laundry. Peace of mind comes standard, with solid concrete and Titan Board construction, remote-access secure undercover parking, intercom entry plus storage cupboard on the ground floor.

Whether you're dreaming of a beachside lifestyle or eyeing a smart investment, this rare gem delivers - sun, surf, socialising, and maybe even the occasional snapper on the line.

Holiday retreat, permanent escape, or stylish downsize - whatever your vision, 2/898 Papamoa Beach Road is a golden opportunity not to be missed.

Life's better by the beach. Come and experience it for yourself.

attributes.description:
Step into the heart of Papamoa's prestigious Royal Palms Beach Estate, where 25 Laguna Key sets the stage for a lifestyle of elegance and tranquillity. From the moment you enter through the dramatic glass-ceiling foyer, flooded with natural light, it’s clear this home is something special.

Spread across 280 sqm (more or less), this meticulously maintained property boasts three beautifully appointed bedrooms, with a fourth versatile room currently set up as a gym. This generously sized space offers exciting possibilities—it could be converted into a fourth bedroom with the addition of a wardrobe or used as a spacious office or third living area. Conveniently, it also enjoys access to the downstairs third bathroom, ensuring practicality and flexibility.

The master suite provides a private retreat, complete with its own deck, breath-taking views of the waterways and Papamoa Hills, a walk-in robe, and an ensuite. The home features three well-designed bathrooms, including one with a spa bath, perfect for family or guests. A fully renovated designer kitchen anchors the open-plan living and dining areas, which lead directly to the adjacent water feature and pond, creating an effortless connection to nature. A large formal lounge provides additional space for gatherings or quiet moments.

Situated on 775 sqm (more or less) of landscaped grounds, this property is as functional as it is beautiful, offering a double internal garage, separate laundry room, ample off-street parking, and stunning sunset views. Located just moments from the beach, Papamoa Plaza, and Fashion Island, 25 Laguna Key offers a unique blend of privacy, luxury, and convenience.

attributes.description:
Setting a new standard in luxury living, this exceptional 2014 Paradise Home showcases timeless elegance and meticulous craftsmanship from every angle. Designed with sophistication and serenity in mind, the property is nestled in lush, landscaped grounds and features a stunning pool oasis—perfect for those who value seclusion, privacy, and relaxed living.

Constructed with a harmonious blend of brick and board-and-batten, this residence boasts engineered oak flooring, soaring 2.7-meter stud and vaulted ceilings, and a thoughtfully curated aesthetic throughout. The expansive layout is bathed in natural sunlight, offering seamless indoor-outdoor flow with multiple spaces designed for both entertaining and unwinding.

The open-plan kitchen is a chef’s dream, appointed with stone benchtops, a Eurotech oven and gas hobs, double dish drawers, a butler’s sink, statement pendant lighting, and an oversized island—creating a natural hub for family and guests. The adjoining living and dining areas are complemented by a cozy gas fireplace, while a spacious second lounge and cleverly integrated office nook add further versatility to the home.

All bedrooms are generously sized and beautifully styled, with bespoke panel feature walls adding character and warmth. The master suite is a true retreat, complete with a luxurious ensuite featuring a double shower, freestanding bath, and direct access off the bedroom to the pool area.

The centrepiece of the outdoor area is a beautifully crafted concrete and plaster pool, perfectly paired with a charming pool house—offering a private sanctuary for year-round enjoyment.

Additional features include full double glazing, a heat pump, a stylishly finished separate laundry, a double garage with attic storage, ample off-street parking, and a garden shed for added convenience.

Ideally located just a short 5-minute (approx.) walk to the beach, shops vibrant eateries and amenities, 20 Santa Cruz Drive is a rare offering that promises to impress even the most discerning of buyers. This is more than a home—it’s a lifestyle.

Looking for the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and a relaxed coastal lifestyle? Well, look no further - this utterly charming 3-bedroom home is sure to impress!

Tucked away behind secure gates, this cozy and inviting home is perfectly positioned to make the most of sunny Papamoa Beach living. Whether you're a first home buyer, downsizer, or savvy investor, this little gem delivers on all fronts - privacy, space, style, and an unbeatable location.

You'll love the warm and welcoming open-plan layout, where the spacious lounge and dining area flows into a well-equipped kitchen. Step straight from the living area onto a sun-drenched private deck, perfect for relaxing, entertaining, or soaking up the Papamoa sunshine. The fully fenced section is a dream for kids, pets, and garden lovers alike, complete with established fruit trees.

The garage has been thoughtfully converted into a fourth bedroom by the current owner - ideal as an extra bedroom, office, or hobby room.

All of this within walking distance to the beach, Papamoa Plaza, Pak 'n Save, and popular dining spots like The Island, Ruby's, and Lantern among others.

Why you'll fall in love:
• Three generously sized bedrooms with built-in wardrobes
• Modern bathroom with separate toilet for added convenience
• Separate laundry or perhaps potential for an en-suite conversion

• Creature comforts include a heat pump and HRV ventilation system
• Sunny deck for entertaining or simply relaxing
• Peaceful location, bordering on the Reserve

You will love the location, lifestyle, and charm - don't miss out!

This adorable home should be at the top of your list. Contact us today to arrange an exclusive private viewing. You'll be so happy you did!

attributes.description:
Effortlessly blending modern elegance with cozy appeal, this immaculately presented property is an incredibly rare opportunity to establish your foothold on the property ladder in style.

Every inch of this architecturally unique Barrett Homes build, completed only two years ago, showcases thoughtful design and quality craftsmanship.
Fresh and welcoming, natural light spills through the airy interior, enhanced with statement, timber slat design features, adding warmth and detail interest.

Purposed for connecting and relaxing, the heart of the home links seamlessly from one area to the next. The open plan configuration of central living is anchored by a sleek modern kitchen featuring stone benchtops, elegant backsplash tiling, and on trend feature shelving to blend function with style.

Expansive sliders unite the indoors with the outdoors, allowing an instant transition to an alfresco oasis.

A louvred pergola adds optional overhead cover to decking, and the bonus of smart festoon lighting and three roll down weatherproof sides creates a year round entertaining haven. Surrounded by lush tropical landscaping, this haven is as inviting as it is low maintenance, freeing up your time to treasure moments with those around you.

Three light filled bedrooms exist on the opposite side of the home, easily accommodating growing families.

Before form comes function, and this home blossoms with practicality. A drop down attic ladder and full length hallway linen cupboard take care of all your storage needs. Off street parking availability caters alternative options for use of the carpeted garage. Sitting and standing timber office desks are a likely drawcard for remote workers.

Topping it off is the idyllic location. As one of the newest kids on the block, Julie Lane is lined with similar properties amid a like minded community. Despite its private laneway positioning, this desirable position resides in close proximity to local amenities, bus stops, and schooling. Access to arterial routes, popular dining, and retail are just a short drive away.

This home will sing to your emotions and likely send you swooning. Don't let this sensational opportunity slip away.

Furniture package available for purchase.

attributes.description:
Hammocks sway in the breeze, birdsong dances through the air and warm steam rises from your slow weekend coffee. Where else can you find a lifestyle like this one. Ladies and Gentlemen, welcome to 30 Nicole Place.

Tucked peacefully into the heart of Golden Sands, this striking three bedroom home has been fully renovated, reimagined, and refined to suit contemporary living, making clever use of space, with two beautiful bathrooms, thoughtful flow, and natural light throughout. The kitchen, tastefully modernised, forms the central hub of the living space, warming it with timber tones, quality appliances, and effortless functionality. Still, the open plan living invites the real star of the show, a backdrop rarely found in suburbia - wide open green, a peaceful reserve, and a seamless connection to nature.

Setting the stage for everything from morning coffee to sunset drinks, outside, the covered deck frames an entertainer's dream. Beautifully manicured gardens, with bore-fed irrigation, ensures a minimal maintenance lifestyle and beautiful outlook, while the outdoor heating, covered BBQ zone and a bubbling spa pool invite your well deserved down time. When it's dry and the evening begins, light the natural wood burning fireplace and gather in comfort for yet another way to spend time with friends, family or your favourite book. This home speaks for itself and you can't afford to miss it.

Features:

3 Bed | 2 Bath | 2 Cars
-Double Glazed
-Covered Outdoor Area
-Beautiful Reserve Views
-Motorhome Parking
-Spa Pool
-Outdoor Shower
-Bore and Sprinkler System
-Solar-lit Landscape Lighting
-Large Double Garage
-Plenty of Off-street Parking
-Fully fenced and gated
-Solar Power System

Everything you need is moments away. Golden Sands School is a short stroll for the kids, with Excelsa Centre and The Sands Town Centre just around the corner for your daily essentials. The beach is close enough to feel like part of the backyard, and walkways and green spaces ensure the outdoors are always calling. Whether you're commuting into town or working from home, this address strikes the perfect balance of lifestyle and location.

Your enquiry on this home is welcomed and even more so, your private inspection. Contact Gareth or Isaac now to discuss how to secure this remarkable residence for yourself.

attributes.header: Seriously for sale, motivated vendors ready to go!
attributes.description:
Don't miss this awesome opportunity to secure a near-new, high-quality home built by Highmark Homes in 2021 - the perfect blend of style, space, and easy living, right in the heart of Papamoa. The vendors are highly motivated and ready to meet the market, so if you're looking for a move-in-ready home with room to breathe, act fast!

Set on a sunny, private site, this brick and tile build offers long-term peace of mind and low-maintenance living, giving you more time to enjoy the beach, local cafés, and lifestyle Papamoa is famous for.

Step inside and be wowed by the sleek open-plan layout. The kitchen is fabulous, with a stunning feature backsplash, stylish pendant lighting, and a spacious butler's pantry with loads of storage - perfect for the home chef or avid entertainer. The main living area is positioned to make the most of the Papamoa Hills views, sunrises and sunsets will have you in awe, bathed in natural light creating a warm, inviting hub for everyday life. From here, the seamless flow out to the covered alfresco deck and spa pool makes outdoor living and entertaining an absolute dream.

The bedrooms are generously sized and thoughtfully designed with maximum storage in mind. The master suite offers a walk-in-wardrobe and a beautifully finished private ensuite, while the family bathroom is elegant and functional. Outdoors, you'll love the easy-care garden with built-in irrigation and bore water - great for your lawn, even better for your water bill.

Fully fenced and with ample off street parking.

Immaculately presented and barely lived in, this home offers a fresh start without the wait. All that's missing is you!

Don't delay - motivated vendors want this sold! Call now to arrange your private viewing and secure this modern Papamoa gem before someone else does.

Please contact the Harcourts sales consultants to arrange a viewing.

attributes.description:
Deadline Sale - Thursday 12th June 2025 at 5.00 pm (Unless Sold Prior)



Intro…



Welcome to your future home in Papamoa Beach! This easy care, low maintenance 3-bedroom, 1-bathroom freehold property is perfect for first-time buyers or investors looking for a fantastic entry-level home. Currently occupied by wonderful tenants who would love to stay, this property offers a good investment opportunity ready to go!



Highlights…



This tidy and low-maintenance home features a single garage and a separate laundry, making daily living a breeze. The open-plan kitchen, living, and dining areas create a welcoming environment, perfect for family gatherings or entertaining friends. With three generous bedrooms, there’s plenty of space for everyone, and the front and rear gardens provide a wonderful outdoor area for kids to play and for you to enjoy some fresh air.



Location…



Situated down a driveway in a quiet cul-de-sac, this home offers the perfect blend of tranquillity and convenience. Papamoa Beach is renowned for its stunning coastline, vibrant community, and family-friendly atmosphere. Enjoy easy access to local shops, parks, and recreational activities, all while being just a short stroll away from the beautiful beach. Whether you’re looking to explore outdoor adventures or simply relax on the shore, this location has it all!



Here’s your opportunity to add your personal touch and truly make this house your home. Don't miss out—view this property at one of our 45-minute open homes and discover everything this wonderful Papamoa Beach home has to offer!



The Northern Group

attributes.description:
Welcome to your next home, where quality, comfort and convenience come together in perfect harmony. Built by Signature Homes and completed in 2021, this one-owner property stands head and shoulders above the average new-build, offering features and value-adding extras that you simply won't find as standard elsewhere.

From the moment you step inside, the attention to detail is clear. Quality floor and wall tiles, additional power points and lighting, over-size fully tiled ensuite shower and fitted walk-in-wardrobe, a walk-in pantry, premium Bosch & Westinghouse kitchen appliances; this home is a visual delight and has been thoughtfully specced to enhance everyday living.

The heart of the home is a sun-soaked, open-plan living area that flows effortlessly out to a stunning covered patio. Drop-down blinds transform this space into an entertainer's dream and perfect for year-round relaxation and social gatherings.

Three generously sized bedrooms provide restful retreats, including a master suite with a beautifully finished en-suite and custom walk-in wardrobe. The other two bedrooms feature built-in wardrobes and plenty of natural light.

Outside, the easy-care garden includes a charming timber shed, raised veggie bed, and eight thriving fruit trees. The garden is a low-maintenance oasis with just enough opportunity to occupy green thumbs but not so much that it will impact those with busy lifestyles.

Situated in a highly sought-after location that consistently draws strong buyer attention, this is your opportunity to secure a home that truly has it all. Don't miss out; call today for a private viewing or join us at the weekend open home!

attributes.description:
Welcome to your happy place just one street back from the beach. This is the ultimate spot for families who love the sun, sea and a home with heart. Full of charm and coastal character, this beachy retreat is made for barefoot living and easy days. Think sandy feet on timber floors, kids running in from the surf and evening BBQs under the stars. With its unique personality and laid back feel, this home is anything but cookie cutter - it's the kind of place that feels like Summer all year round. Tucked away for peace and privacy, yet close enough to hear the waves, it's your own special sanctuary where memories are made and moments are treasured. Whether you're chasing the perfect Papamoa lifestyle or just want a space to unwind, this is where family living meets beachside bliss.

Please contact the Harcourts sales consultant below to arrange a viewing.
